item.title: Config file in .NET Core 3.0 Console Application
item.description: If you want add configuration file into your Console Application using .NET Core, this tutorial is for you üòâ DISCLAMER ‚ùó You can find in the Internet more solutions. Let me know, if there is something wrong with my solution. üòâ Let’ start First, add new NuGet packages in your project: $ dotnet add package Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder $ dotnet add package Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json Add new file to your project.
